page.title: 11OKEHAMPTON BY-PASS SURVEY
page.content: We carried out a survey in Okehampton and asked the following questions: 1 Do you think Okehampton needs a by-pass? 2 Which route do you think the by-pass should take? 3 What are your reasons for your answer in Q2? These are our results: 1 Yes = 29 No = 2. 2 Northern = 7 Southern = 24. 3 Those who chose the southern route gave these answers: good farmland would be wasted and it could be pushed through parliament faster. For the northern route people thought that the beauty of the Dartmoor National Park should remain intact. We conclude that the vast majority want a by-pass and the public is also in favour of the southern route which passes through Dartmoor. Mike Ward.
